0.text:
The first series was set in the Great
War.

3.text: This second series jumps into the middle of the nineteen twenties,

6.text: which was obviously a world in turmoil,

8.text: where the war is behind, and the future is quite breezy up ahead.

13.text: It's really about the whole village,

15.text: and it's about the Middletons, who live on the farm,

18.text: and it's about the Allinghams, who have had a very good war.

22.text: In the last series, they were in a big house,

25.text: but they've made a fortune during the war,

27.text: and they now live in a very big, and very beautiful, house,

30.text: which is why we're filming at Lyme.

33.text: Ooh, what can I tell you without giving too much away?

37.text: There's an explosive private life, for George this series,

41.text: an explosive private life, it's pretty intense.

47.text: My name is Emily Beecham, and I play Caro Allingham,

50.text: who is a daughter in the big house, so I live here.

53.text: My name is Charlie Murphy, and I play Martha Lane,

56.text: and this series, the second series, our paths cross quite a lot,

62.text: so I'm spending a lot of time in the big house as well.

68.text: on the grounds, of this location.

71.text: Yes, yes, many many many, yes.

74.text: It's such a beautiful setting, that we don't mind spending 12 to 14 hours working here.

83.text: It's a funny balance, filming in a National Trust property,

85.text: because there are so many fantastic, spectacular,

89.text: and beautiful things, that you can't actually use.

93.text: You can't sit on some chairs, you can't lean on some tables,

96.text:
you certainly can't smoke cigarettes under
the chandelier.

99.text: So you have to be extremely careful as a film crew.

103.text: This house is exquisite, absolutely beautiful.

108.text: It just creates an entire world, it makes the programme,

111.text: it makes the show, and the characters,

113.text: it makes it just come alive,

115.text: when you're surrounded by something so authentic and so awe-inspiring.

118.text:
I love filming in the grounds, there was a
particular scene,

122.text: that involves the lake, and I'll say no more.

125.text: but it was a very challenging day, and we all got very wet,

129.text: and it was spectacular, to have been a part of it.
